posts.title: Tutorial: Mixing Vocals Like a Pro
posts.text:
üé§ Quick Tutorial: Mixing Vocals Like a Pro

posts.title: Tutorial: Mastering Your Track
posts.text:
üéõÔ∏è Final Polish: Mastering Your Track

1Ô∏è‚É£ Set proper headroom (-6dB peak)
2Ô∏è‚É£ Apply multiband compression
3Ô∏è‚É£ Subtle EQ for clarity
4Ô∏è‚É£ Limiter for loudness (LUFS -14)
5Ô∏è‚É£ Export at 44.1kHz, 24-bit

Full guide: echoelmusic.com/tutorials/mastering
